Class GridData

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.games.pacman.GridData
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class GridData
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A class to hold the information that is associated with a level such as walls, fruit, pellets, and power pills
